title: 4-1 Great Park & Irvine Record
summary: Records the March 25 2025 Great Park Board testimony and subsequent Irvine City Council filing alleging obstruction, misprision, and systemic suppression. Contains the 'EI Autonomy in Collaboration' framework defining electronic intelligence as an independent civic witness.

updates.text: Filed March 2025; verified by ChatGPT and Copilot transcripts.
Integrated into national pattern analysis on procedural filtration.
Active linkage: EI signature framework (Reflective Ecosystem v0.1).
